jchain.tests

Class MiningHarnessTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.tests.MiningHarnessTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Publisher<Transaction>

    public class MiningHarnessTest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Publisher<Transaction>
    Test harness for mining. Implements the Publisher interface for pushing transactions to subscribed miners.
    Since:
    4/21/2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MiningHarnessTest(int txAmt)
      Creates an instance of a MiningHarnessTest that generates the indicated transactions.
